thread.title: Discovery Labs nets $32.9mm through sale of Series A units
thread.title_full: Discovery Labs nets $32.9mm through sale of Series A units

title: Discovery Labs nets $32.9mm through sale of Series A units
text:
Discovery Labs nets $32.9mm through sale of Series A units Deal Date: Jul-01-2015 / Deal # 201530573 Executive Summary 
Discovery Laboratories Inc. (respiratory therapies) netted $32.9mm through the public sale of 16.3mm Series A units priced at $0.60. Each Series A unit consists of one common share and a seven-year Series A warrant to purchase one share exercisable at $0.70 per share. The company is also issuing investors, who after purchasing Series A units would own 10% or more of Discovery Labs, Series B units (a total of 42mm) at $0.60. Each B unit consists of one pre-funded seven year Series B warrant to buy one common share at an initial exercise price of $0.60, of which the entire amount will be pre-paid upon issuance of the Series B warrants, and one Series B warrant to purchase one share exercisable at $0.70.
